item.title: Tough Mudder Sells Out Their First Event
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:
We are proud to announce that last week the first ToughMudder event sold out. They capped admission at 4500 mudders to ensure safety and a smooth first event. (It's good to know someone is looking out for your safety when you're jumping 15 feet into a pit of mud.)

The post Tough Mudder Sells Out Their First Event appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
One of the big successes of this year for us was the Tough Mudder website. We are proud to announce that last week the first event sold out, they capped admission at 4500 mudders to ensure safety and a smooth first event. (It’s good to know someone is looking out for your safety when you’re jumping 15 feet into a pit of mud!)

Congratulations to the Mudders from everyone at mimoYmima, we look forward to helping with the future events!

The post Tough Mudder Sells Out Their First Event appeared first on mimoYmima.
